title: First Day
description: Today is your first day of college. Your alarm wakes you up in time. What do you do?

effect.outcome: You look at yourself in the mirror and you're looking dapper.
You feel your muscles and joints come to life!

choices.text: Talk to yourself in the mirror

effect.outcome: You feel more confident in yourself!
You get yourself ready without doing anything special, but somehow you feel less tense.

title: First Day Orientation
description: You and other freshmen are gathered in the auditorium for orientation. What do you do?

choices.text: Sit next to the smartest looking person

effect.outcome: Smart Kid: Hey, fellow freshman! Nice to meet you!

choices.text: Sit next to the cute girl

onPass.outcome: You and Jane hit it off and start talking.

onFail.outcome: The girl looks at you for a second before moving seats. You feel embarrassed but try to play it cool.

effect.outcome: You sit alone through the orientation and try to make the best of it, but you feel a bit lonely.

title: Campus Open
description: The campus is open and freshmen are allowed to explore. What do you do?

choices.text: Take A Walk Through The Campus Gardens

effect.outcome: You take a walk through the campus gardens and enjoy the fresh air., the flowers are blooming and the trees are green.
You go to the library and read some interesting books.

choices.text: Try And Socialize With Other Freshmen

effect.outcome: Some Of Them Are Actually Nice! You make some new friends.
You go to the gym and work out for a bit.

title: Finally Back Home
description: After being out all day, you finally get back home. You eat dinner but now have some free time. What do you do?

effect.outcome: You sit down and meditate for a while. You feel more relaxed.
You go to sleep early and get a good night's rest.

title: First Day of Classes
description: You wake up ealy and realize it's the first day of official classes. What do you do?

effect.outcome: You arrive at class early and get a good seat.
You sleep in a bit more, but you feel a bit groggy.
You jog to class and feel more awake and agile.
You eat a big breakfast and feel energized.

title: First Class
description: You enter your first class and see a lot of new faces. What do you do?

effect.outcome: You sit in the front row and pay attention to the lecture, it was a bit boring but bearable.
You Socialized with some classmates in the back row, where you were away from the intructors view.
You take notes during the lecture and feel more prepared for the class.
You daydream during the lecture and spaced out.

title: Lunch Time
description: It's lunchtime and you have some free time. What do you do?

effect.outcome: You eat lunch with your blockmates and have a great time.
You eat lunch alone and feel a bit lonely.
You scroll through social media and catch up with the online world.
You take a nap during lunch and feel more refreshed.

title: After Class
description: After class, you have some free time. What do you do?

effect.outcome: You drop by the gym and work out for a bit.

choices.text: Approach Jane Who You Saw Yesterday

onPass.outcome: You Two grab a coffee and talk about your classes. You feel more confident in yourself!

onFail.outcome: Jane gives you a flimsy excuse to leave. You feel embarrassed but theres no helping it.

choices.text: Go And Gamble In The Shady Alley

onPass.outcome: You Played Them Like A Fiddle! You won a lot of money and feel like a genius.

onFail.outcome: The Other Gamblers Sensed blood In The Water. After A While They Took Out Knives And Stabbed You.

effect.outcome: You go home and relax for the rest of the Evening.

title: Day Off From Classes
description: No Classes Today So You Can Take It Easy. What Do You Do?

effect.outcome: You sleep in and feel more rested.
You go for a jog and feel more agile.
You make a healthy breakfast made of eggs and fresh fruits. Of Coruse with a glass of milk.

choices.text: Lay in Bed And Scroll Through Social Media

effect.outcome: You feel your brain rot as you scroll through social media.

title: Afternoon Free Time
description: You have some free time. What do you do?

choices.text: Open Strava and Go For A Run

effect.outcome: You open Strava on your phone to track your run. You run for kilometers and feel great but exhausted.

choices.text: Hop On The Computer And Play Some Games

effect.outcome: Its was fun playing and you loose track of time. You feel a bit tired but happy.

choices.text: Turn On the Speaker And Play Some Music

effect.outcome: You Sing Your Heart Out In The Comfort Of Your Own Home, And Feel More Confident In Yourself.

onPass.outcome: She Eagerly Replies To Your Messages And You Two Go On A Long Back And Forth Conversation.

onFail.outcome: She Leaves You On Read. You Feel Embarrassed And A Bit Sad.

title: Mid Day Free Time
description: You have some more free time. What do you do?

effect.outcome: You go to the gym and work out for a bit.
It Was Entertaining But You Feel A But You Were Sedebtary For Too Long.
You clean up your room and feel more organized and productive.
You Sit And Do Absolutely Nothing. You Feel A Bit Bored But Relaxed.

title: Evening Free Time
description: You Have School Tomorrow So You Should Probably Get Some Rest. What Do You Do?

effect.outcome: You Hit The Hay Early And Get A Good Night's Rest.
You Do Your Backlog Of Housekeeping And Feel A Bit Drained But Accomplished.
You Zone Out And Stare At The Ceiling For A While, You Loose Track Of Time

choices.text: Stay Up Late And Scroll Through Social Media

effect.outcome: You sleep really late and your incurred a bit of sleep debt.

title: Surpise Cardio
description: You got up early in the morning to go for a little run, but a wild dog got lose and started to chase you. /nWhat are you gonna do?

onPass.outcome: You ran away from the dog and it didn't catch you. You feel a bit tired.

onFail.outcome: You tripped and fell. The dog caught up to you and bit your leg.

onPass.outcome: You stood your ground and the dog backed off. You feel more confident.

onFail.outcome: You stood your ground, but the dog bit you. You feel scared.

title: Pop Quiz
description:
You haggardly dragged your way to your class room, when suddenly the professor announced a sudden quiz. 
What do you do?

onPass.outcome: You aced the quiz and felt proud of yourself.

onFail.outcome: You failed the quiz and felt embarrassed.

onPass.outcome: You skipped the quiz and felt more confident.

onFail.outcome: You skipped the quiz and felt guilty.

title: Study Group
description: You and your friends decided to form a study group. What do you do?

effect.outcome: You studied hard and learned a lot.
You and your friends goofed off and had a great time.

title: Night at Home
description: After a long day of classes, you finally get to go home. What do you do?

effect.outcome: You went home and relaxed for a while. You feel more at ease.
You went out with friends and had a great time.

title: Morning Update
description: You woke early in the morning and watched tv as you eat breakfast, What should You do?

effect.outcome: You watched the news and learned a lot.
You watched cartoons and felt nostalgic.

title: Presentation Day
description: You and your groupmates have a presentation ?

check.outcome: You presented and learned a lot.

effect.outcome: You and your groupmates goofed off while presenting and had a great time.

title: Study Group
description: You and your friends decided to form a study group. What do you do?

effect.outcome: You studied hard and learned a lot.
You and your friends goofed off and had a great time.

title: Night at Home
description: After a long day of classes, you finally get to go home. What do you do?

effect.outcome: You went home and relaxed for a while. You feel more at ease.
You went out with friends and had a great time.

title: Faulty Faucet
description: You tried to take a morning Shower but the faucet seemed to be dry. What should you do?

onFail.outcome: You failed to fix the shower and had to go to school unwashed..

title: Classroom Chatter
description: You and your classmates are chatting in the classroom. What do you do?

effect.outcome: You joined the conversation and had a great time.
You stayed quiet and felt a bit lonely.

title: Faculty Visit
description:
You Suddenly got called to the faculty office due to a concern of plagarism on your previous work. 
 What should you do?

onPass.outcome: You proved that you didn't plagiarize and the faculty was satisfied.

onFail.outcome: You failed to prove that you didn't plagiarize and the faculty was not happy.

effect.outcome: You apologized and the faculty was satisfied.

title: Karaoke Night
description: Before you went home, your classmates invited you to join them to a karaoke bar. What should you do?

effect.outcome: You celebrated with friends and had a great time.
You relaxed at home and felt more at ease.

title: Surprise Cat
description: You woke up in the morning and decided to go for a breakfast run, but on the way there you ran into a cat. What should you do?

effect.outcome: You kneeled down and pet the cat, He rolled over making a little more calm.
You Tried rub the cat's belly, But before you could get closer, he scratched your arm and ran away.

title: Carry Request
description: You we're on your way to class when suddenly a couple of strangers asked you if you could help carry their luggage. What do you do?

onPass.outcome: You helped them carry their luggage and they were very grateful, But your muscles became sore.

onFail.outcome: You tried to help them, but you ended up dropping their luggage. They were not happy.

effect.outcome: You declined their request and walked away. They looked disappointed.

title: Random Recitation
description: You're in the classroom and your Professor suddenly called for you to recite. What do you do?

onPass.outcome: You recited perfectly, making your batch mates impressed increasing your reputation.

onFail.outcome: You stuttered and forgot what to say. The professor looked disappointed.

effect.outcome: You refused to recite. The professor looked angry, but you stood saved your face.

title: Evening liesure
description: After class, you decided to go straight home. But once you're home you felt bored. What do you do?

effect.outcome: You watched a movie and it was really entertaining. You feel relaxed.
You played video games for hours and forgot to eat. You feel tired.
You went to sleep early and got a good night's rest.
You laze around doing nothing for the rest of the day, it felt wrong, but it felt so good.

title: First Day (Late Start)
description: Today is Monday. Your alarm didn't wake you up in time. What do you do?

effect.outcome: You skipped grooming yourself so you look shaggy.
Your muscles and joints feel tight as you hurry up to school.

choices.text: Skip the morning routine and hurry up to school

effect.outcome: You arrived early but feel off the entire day from skipping your routine.
You get ready slowly and arrive very late to your class.

title: Pop Quiz
description: The professor announces a surprise quiz. No one saw it coming.

choices.text: Review the lessons during the time remaining

effect.outcome: Reviewing last-minute improved your chance of passing.
Relaxing gave you a clear headspace during the quiz.
You feel uncertain as the quiz begins.

title: Random Lecture Encounter
description: You find yourself sitting next to a classmate you've never spoken to before. They seem like a cool person, and they're asking about your thoughts on the lecture.

choices.text: Start a conversation and try to make a new friend.

effect.outcome: You guys hit it off and you became friends.

choices.text: Try to ignore your classmate and focus on taking notes.

effect.outcome: You focus on taking notes and ignored your classmates question.

choices.text: You compliment them on their neat notes

effect.outcome: Your classmate feels very happy about your compliment.

choices.text: You struggle in understanding a concept so you ask your classmate to explain a concept about the lecture.

effect.outcome: Your classmate to explain it to you in simpler terms..

title: Strange Encounter
description: Walking home from school you hear faint footsteps behind you. You turn your head to see a hooded person standing still, just... looking in your direction. You feel a little bit afraid.

choices.text: Ignore the hooded person and walk a little bit faster

effect.outcome: You decide it's not worth the risk and hurry home safely.

onPass.outcome: The figure hesitantly responds, 'Just walking,' then smiles and walks away.

onFail.outcome: The figure doesn't respond. The silence weighs on you all the way home.

onPass.outcome: You win the fight and arrive home unscathed.

onFail.outcome: You lose the fight and arrive home with bruises.

title: Bad Weather
description: Today is Tuesday. You woke up and looked out the window — it's raining heavily. You have to go to school but you remember you lost your umbrella.

choices.text: Wait for the rian to stop

effect.outcome: You wait for the rain to stop but you we're late to your class.

choices.text: Go to shcool even without an umbrella.

effect.outcome: Going to school without an umrella resulted to you being wet

choices.text: Call a classmate/friend and ask if they can bring an extra umbrella

effect.outcome: You avoid getting wet, but feel a bit guilty about being a bother.

choices.text: Use a plastic bag and improvised rain gear

effect.outcome: You get to school mostly dry, but people laugh at your 'creative' look.

title: Club Recruitment Fair
description: Today is a Club Recruitment Fair where clubs are looking for members. You hear that there are some shady clubs that are cult like

choices.text: Join PixelForge, they say the club focues on game development and game nights.

effect.outcome: You joined PxelForge.

choices.text: Join Math Society, they say the club is about learning and teaching things about math.

effect.outcome: Going to school without an umrella resulted to you being wet

choices.text: Join FilmFrame, they say the club is about filming and photography

effect.outcome: Joining FilmFrame helped you get some aura points holding a camera.

choices.text: Join the Archive, they say that the club is a library club, but no one sees them borrow books

effect.outcome: You read a book that they lend you that contains your personal information.

title: Stray Cat Encounter
description: On your way home, a stray cat blocks your path. It seems hungry but cautious.

effect.outcome: You gave the food but you were scratch by the cat.
You safely backed away from the cat,

choices.text: Try to chase the cat away.

onPass.outcome: You chase the cat away succesfuly.

onFail.outcome: The cat got angry and attacked you.

choices.text: Join the Archive, they say that the club is a library club, but no one sees them borrow books

effect.outcome: You read a book that they lend you that contains your personal information.

title: Stray Cat Encounter
description: On your way home, a stray cat blocks your path. It seems hungry but cautious.

effect.outcome: You gave the food but you were scratch by the cat.
You safely backed away from the cat,

choices.text: Try to chase the cat away.

onPass.outcome: You chase the cat away succesfuly.

onFail.outcome: The cat got angry and attacked you.

choices.text: Join the Archive, they say that the club is a library club, but no one sees them borrow books

effect.outcome: You read a book that they lend you that contains your personal information.

title: Morning Bus Encounter
description: You're on your morning commute to school. The bus is full, and an elderly person boards. There’s only one seat left, and you're sitting in it.

choices.text: Offer your seat to the elderly person.

effect.outcome: The elderly person thanks you with a warm smile. You feel proud of your decision.

choices.text: Pretend to stretch and stand up casually.

effect.outcome: You play it cool and avoid attention while doing the right thing.

choices.text: Stay seated and look at your phone.

effect.outcome: You avoid discomfort, but people nearby shoot judgmental glances your way.

choices.text: Offer the seat and start a friendly conversation.

onPass.outcome: They enjoy the conversation and share some insightful life advice.

onFail.outcome: They smile politely but seem disinterested. Slightly awkward.

title: Café Small Talk
description: You stop by your usual café for a quick drink before class. The barista recognizes you and initiates small talk while preparing your order.

choices.text: Chat back casually about your morning.

effect.outcome: You enjoy a light conversation and leave with a smile.

choices.text: Give a one-word answer and focus on your phone.

effect.outcome: You keep things short and mentally stay in your own zone.

choices.text: Ask the barista about their day.

onPass.outcome: They brighten up and you have a surprisingly meaningful exchange.

onFail.outcome: They respond awkwardly, and the moment passes.

effect.outcome: You get your drink faster, but the vibe is noticeably worse.

title: Found Money
description: While walking through the hallway near the vending machines, you spot a crumpled bill on the floor. No one seems to be around.

choices.text: Pick it up and keep it.

effect.outcome: You buy yourself a quick snack and move on, but part of you wonders who dropped it.

choices.text: Ask around to see if anyone lost it.

effect.outcome: You ask a few people, and eventually someone claims it gratefully.

choices.text: Leave it alone and walk away.

effect.outcome: You choose not to get involved and continue on your day with peace of mind.

choices.text: Pick it up and donate it to the lost-and-found box.

onPass.outcome: You feel a surprising sense of honor as you place it in the box.

onFail.outcome: You hesitate too long and someone else picks it up.

title: Late Night Coding
description: You have a coding work that is needed to be done for your upcoming final project.

choices.text: Push through the night and code until it's done.

effect.outcome: You manage to finish a huge chunk of your project, but you're physically and mentally drained.

choices.text: Code for an hour, then sleep early.

effect.outcome: You made some progress and felt well-rested the next day.

choices.text: Copy some online code and hope the professor doesn't notice.

effect.outcome: You manage to pass something, but a nagging guilt weighs on you.

choices.text: Procrastinate and play a game instead.

effect.outcome: You feel better mentally, but your project deadline looms like a dark cloud.
